name: Australian Nascar Horror
description:
Australian Nascar Horror Scary racing game where you can choose one of Australian Monstrosity Cars and destroy enemies while winning the race! 
(Did we mention you can unlock achievements?) The game contains chroma skins for every car - make sure to collect Chroma Paint and unlock all of them. If you encounter any bug, please report it in the comment or on DragonFarm Discord Server - https://discord.gg/qq6x8rG  Credits:

FumyaHero - 2D artist
Mromru - Programmer
